DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety ZD6474 patient NSCLC Failure Prior Platinum-based Chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: This Study Assess Efficacy Safety ZD6474 Subjects With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer .
DOC.criteria: Histologic cytologic confirmation NSCLC ( locally advance metastatic , IBIV ) Failure firstline platinumbased chemotherapy Mixed small cell nonsmallcell histology Bronchoalveolar carcinoma Prior chemotherapy herbal preparation must discontinue 4 week start study therapy ( 6 week nitrosoureas , mitomycin suramin ) Prior treatment docetaxel
